document_data.mainbody: '''Farsea Marshwine''' was a variety of red [[wine]], produced in the [[Farsea Swamp]] of [[Cormyr]]. It was exported as far as the [[Western Heartlands]], the lands along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Farsea Marshwine was a sweet and bitter red. Some described its watery taste as if it's been thrown overboard. This wine was sold in thin and long tan-colored bottles.
document_data.Notable Users: *[[Danzo Arkwright]], the proprietor of the [[Sword Coast Couriers]] mail service based out of [[Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
